name: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
outline: The true story of the "Flying Sikh" - world champion runner and Olympian Milkha Singh -- who overcame the massacre of his family...

name: Aashiqui 2
outline: Rahul loses his fans and fame due to alcoholism. But he then decides to turn a small time singer into a rising star.

name: Chennai Express
outline: Rahul embarks on a journey to a small town in Tamil Nadu to fulfill the last wish of his grandfather:...

name: D-Day
outline: A team of experts dispatched to bring in The Most Wanted Man in India almost achieves the unthinkable ... until something goes horribly wrong.

name: 3 Idiots
outline: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

name: Bajatey Raho
outline: Surviving family members and friends of a man who was conned by the cunning businessman Sabbarwahl string together a series of their own cons in an attempt to bring him down.

name: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
outline: Ram falls in love with Sona, who lives on the fields of Punjab. He follows her to her farm, where her elder brother challenges him to produce more seed on their fields. If he wins, he will be allowed to marry her.

name: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
outline: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani is the story of the relationship between two characters, Bunny (Ranbir Kapoor) & Naina (Deepika Padukone)...

name: My Name Is Khan
outline: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President seriously, and embarks on a cross-country journey.

name: Ra.One
outline: A video game developer's world spirals out of control when his shape-shifting indestructible virtual creation becomes all too real.

name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
outline: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their number becomes engaged.

name: Lootera
outline: The year is 1953. A visiting archaeologist called Varun Shrivastav comes to the village of Manikpur...

name: Raanjhanaa
outline: A small-town boy needs to break through the class divide to gain acceptance from his childhood sweetheart who is in love with big city ideals.

name: B.A. Pass
outline: After losing his parents in a car accident, Mukesh stays at his Aunt's house in Delhi. Enrolled in a...

name: Issaq
outline: A contemporary adaptation of Romeo and Juliet set in the backdrop of Varanasi in the UP heartland, complete with naxalism, sand mining mafia and of course the timeless love story.

name: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
outline: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers...

name: Like Stars on Earth
outline: An eight year old boy is thought to be lazy and a troublemaker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

name: Don 2
outline: An international gangster turns himself in, then dramatically escapes - only to face treachery and betrayal.

name: Kai po che!
outline: Three friends growing up in India at the turn of the millennium set out to open a training academy to produce the country's next cricket stars.

name: Jab Tak Hai Jaan
outline: After finding and losing his true love in London, Samar Anand defies death by becoming a bomb disposal expert for the Indian Army. Returning to London after 10 years, he suffers amnesia after an accident. Will he be reunited with his love?

name: Barfi!
outline: Three young people learn that love can neither be defined nor contained by society's norms of normal and abnormal.

name: Kal Ho Naa Ho
outline: Life of a very serious girl Naina, changes on the arrival of her new neighbour, Aman, who teaches her a new way to live.

name: Himmatwala
outline: An honest temple priest takes on more than he can handle when he bears witness to a murder and gives evidence in a court of law against a powerful landlord in his village.

name: Delhi Safari
outline: A group of animals plan a trip to Delhi in order to ask the parliament why the forest they live in is on the verge of destruction.

name: Yamla Pagla Deewana 2
outline: The trio of Dharam (Dharmendra), Paramveer (Sunny Deol) and Gajodhar (Bobby Deol) reunite, this time in the UK...

name: Chakde! India
outline: The story of a hockey player who returns to the game as a coach of a women's hockey team.

name: Shootout at Wadala
outline: The first-ever registered encounter by the Mumbai Police, which took place on November 1, 1982. Based on a true story.

name: Gangs of Wasseypur
outline: A clash between Sultan (a Qureishi dacoit chief) and Shahid Khan (a Pathan who impersonates him) leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

name: English Vinglish
outline: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter everyday because of her inability to speak and understand English.

name: Om Shanti Om
outline: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.

name: Vicky Donor
outline: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

name: Madras Cafe
outline: Madras Cafe is an upcoming Indian political action thriller film directed by Shoojit Sircar and produced by John Abraham and Ronnie Lahiri...

name: Go Goa Gone
outline: A group of friends along with members of the Russian mafia get stuck on a remote island off the coast of Goa, when new drugs at a rave party are consumed by the guests, turning them into zombies.

name: Water
outline: The film examines the plight of a group of widows forced into poverty at a temple in the holy city of Varanasi. It focuses on a relationship between one of the widows, who wants to escape the social restrictions imposed on widows, and a man who is from the highest caste and a follower of Mahatma Gandhi.

name: Talaash
outline: A cop, investigating the mysterious death of a filmstar, meets a sex-worker, while he faces some personal problems psychologically. The mystery connects these people in a way, that ultimately changes their lives.

name: Matru ki Bijlee ka Mandola
outline: Harry is an industrialist who loves his daughter Bijlee, and the bond they share with Harry's man friday, Matru. Bijlee's plan to wed the son of a politician, however, brings twists and turns in the lives of Matru, Bijlee and Mandola.

name: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham...
outline: Yashvardhan Raichand lives a very wealthy lifestyle along with his wife, Nandini, and two sons, Rahul and Rohan...

name: Fukrey
outline: The paths of four dream-chasing college friends cross with an array of colourful characters, from a tough-talking Punjabi female don to a Jugaad Baaz college watchman. Mayhem ensues.

name: The Warrior
outline: In feudal India, a warrior (Khan) who renounces his role as the longitme enforcer to a local lord becomes the prey in a murderous hunt through the Himalayan mountains.

name: Aurangzeb
outline: A cop goes undercover into a gangster's family as his son. This sets in place a chain reaction of complications and increasingly uncontrollable events.

name: Ghajini
outline: A student is endangered after she warns a wealthy male that a crazed recluse with short term memory loss is out to kill him, not knowing the reason behind the recluse's actions.

name: Nautanki Saala!
outline: An actor's life changes dramatically when he saves a stranger from suicide.

name: Luv Shuv Tey Chicken Khurana
outline: Omi Khurana's London dream has just ended. On the run from a dangerous UK gangster who he owes money to...

name: Bombay Talkies
outline: One hundred years of Hindi cinema is celebrated in four short stories showcasing the power of film.

name: Race 2
outline: Ranvir treads through the world of the Indian mafia in Turkey as he looks to avenge the death of his lover and partner in crime.

name: Swades
outline: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

name: Student of the Year
outline: Dean Yoginder Vashisht (Rishi Kapoor), retired, has fallen gravely ill. Several students from his final year at St...

name: Special 26
outline: Based on a real life group of con artists who pulled off many clever robberies during 1980s, and robbed...

name: Krrish 3
outline: After defeating the villainous Dr. Siddhant Arya, and bringing his father Rohit back from the dead,...

name: Paheli
outline: A folk tale - supernatural love story about a ghost who falls in love with a newlywed woman.

name: Namastey London
outline: A man takes his thoroughly-British daughter to his home country, India. There, he arranges a marriage to someone she considers a fool. The daughter attempts to outwit them, but the groom quietly and patiently hatches his own plan.

name: Desi Boyz
outline: Two friends lose their jobs, then part bitterly after they get exposed as male escorts.

name: Mere Dad Ki Maruti
outline: Everyone's dancing and making merry in the Khullar household, especially Tej who is all set to gift...

name: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
outline: During their college years, Anjali was in love with her best-friend Rahul, but he had eyes only for Tina. Years later, Rahul and the now-deceased Tina's eight-year-old daughter attempts to reunite her father and Anjali.

name: Murder 3
outline: A hot-shot fashion and wildlife photographer Vikram gets into a relationship with Nisha. She moves in...

name: Rang De Basanti
outline: A young woman from England comes to India to make a documentary about her grandfather's diary which was written in the 1920s about the Indian Independence with five young men.

name: Aladin
outline: Since he was a child, Aladin Chatterjee has been teased for his fairytale name. As a college student he follows his namesake's footsteps; unleashing genie Genius and wooing exchange student Jasmine. But the evil Ringmaster approaches.

name: Jaane Tu... Ya Jaane Na
outline: Two best friends being convinced that they are not in love search for each other's love.

name: Fashion
outline: Set against the glittering backdrop of the glamorous but ruthless world of haute couture fashion, this...

name: Love Aaj Kal
outline: An old-fashioned romantic tells his personal love story to a modern man who has just broken up with his girlfriend. Has love really ever changed?

name: Devdas
outline: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.

name: Wake Up Sid
outline: A spoiled young adult living in Mumbai experiences a change in his lazy ways when he meets a woman at a party, who inspires him to "wake up".

name: Kahaani
outline: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met her husband.

name: Raajneeti
outline: Just about to acquire a PhD, a young man becomes embroiled in politics, deceit, lies and murder.

name: RockStar
outline: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

name: I, Me aur Main
outline: As Ishaan, a music producer who has commitment issues with the women in his life, feels a connection with Gauri, his next-door neighbor, he begins to learn the importance of relationships.

name: I Hate Luv Storys
outline: Jay doesn't believe in love Stories, and Simran, is a girl who's in love with the idea of Love itself.

name: Udaan
outline: Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.

name: Jodhaa Akbar
outline: A sixteenth century love story about a marriage of alliance that gave birth to true love between a great Mughal emperor, Akbar, and a Rajput princess, Jodha.

name: Dabangg
outline: A corrupt police officer faces challenges from his family, gangsters and politicians.

name: New York
outline: A taxi-driver is detained on suspicion of being a terrorist.

name: Tees Maar Khan
outline: Posing as a movie producer, a robber cons an entire village to help him rob a treasure-laden train.

name: ABCD (Any Body Can Dance)
outline: When a capable dancer is provoked by the evil design of his employer, naturally he will be out to prove his mettle.

name: Aashiqui
outline: Rahul and Anu Verghese meet on the same day, while both are held by the police on charges of creating a disturbance...

name: Ghanchakkar
outline: Sanju, Pandit and Idris rob a bank and decide to share the money.

name: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
outline: A middle-aged man who lost his love for life rediscovers it by assuming a new identity in order to rekindle the romantic spark in his marriage.

name: Guru
outline: A villager, Gurukant Desai, arrives in Bombay 1958, and rises from its streets to become the GURU, the biggest tycoon in Indian history.

name: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
outline: A young man and woman - both of Indian descent but born and raised in Britain - fall in love during a trip to Switzerland. However, the girl's traditional father takes her back to India to fulfill a betrothal promise.

name: Veer-Zaara
outline: The story of the love between Veer Pratap Singh, an Indian, and Zaara Hayaat Khan, a Pakistani...a love so great it knows no boundaries...

name: Ek Tha Tiger
outline: RAW agent Tiger is on a mission to retrieve information from a scientist in Dublin.

name: Saawariya
outline: Two souls arrive in a small town, one on vacation, the other to meet a lover. They spend the most magical dream-like days of their lives in that town... with each other.

name: Dil Chahta Hai
outline: The film is about three distinct characters, Akash (Aamir Khan), Sameer (Saif Ali Khan) and Siddharth (Akshaye Khanna), their individual relationships and the effect that these relationships have on them.

name: Pusher
outline: A desperate drug-pusher must avoid police, and find money to pay-off a huge debt.

name: Karthik Calling Karthik
outline: A much abused loner achieves success, and even wins the heart of his gorgeous co-worker, after getting early morning mysterious phone calls from someone.

name: Ladies vs. Ricky Bahl
outline: Three women hire a fourth to try and get even with a con-man.

name: Bachna Ae Haseeno
outline: The story of a young man and the three loves of his life, from 1996 to 2008.

name: Don
outline: A simple man (Vijay) from the city of mumbai is recruited by a police officer to masquerade as the Don, the leader of an international gang of smugglers. But things go wrong, the officer is killed and now vijay is on his own, with only his lover (Roma) and a lame ex con artist to help him to prove his innocence.

name: Cocktail
outline: A love triangle between a guy and two girls, who are best friends but the complete opposite of one another.

name: Sholay
outline: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture him.

name: Gippi
outline: Gippi is a 14-year-old girl who lives in Simla with her mother Pappi and little brother Booboo. She...

name: Kambakkht Ishq
outline: A romantic comedy about an Indian stuntman who takes Hollywood by storm but cannot find true love.

name: Mohabbatein
outline: In India, open romance is forbidden, as is showing affection in public. A college principal named Narayan is a strong believer in this...

name: Sixteen
outline: Welcome to sixteen's world. A world where growing up has speeded up multifold times from the time you and me were kids...

name: Main Hoon Na
outline: An army major goes undercover as a college student. His mission his both professional and personal: to protect his general's daughter from a radical militant, and to find his estranged half-brother.

name: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster
outline: Hired to kill a nobleman, the assassin instead falls for the former's unstable wife.

name: Black
outline: The cathartic tale of a deaf, mute and blind girl, and her teacher who brings a ray of light into her world of BLACK.

name: Rock On!!
outline: Four friends reunite to relive their moments of glory as a rock band.

name: Hum Tumhare Hain Sanam
outline: Radha and Suraj have been friends since childhood. Gopal has been in love with Radha ever since they spent a few years together as kids...

name: Dabangg 2
outline: Chulbul Pandey is transferred and promoted to Kanpur. He is happily married with Rajjo. Kanpur witness...

name: Wedding Planners
outline: Two wedding planner-partners achieve success but differences turn them into bitter rivals.

name: Patiala House
outline: a victim of British racial violence and profiling prevents his son from playing cricket.

name: Jism 2
outline: Izna, a porn star, is given a task by IB Officer Ayaan Thakur to get hold of her ex-lover Kabir, who is now a gangster. But will Kabir accept Izna back into his life?

name: 7 Khoon Maaf
outline: Susanna's quest for love leads to a series of marriages, each ending in the mysterious death of her latest husband.

name: Dhoom:2
outline: ACP Jai Dixit and his best friend Ali takes on an international thief known only as Mr. A. Will they be able to catch him?

name: Luck by Chance
outline: A struggling actor comes from Delhi to Bombay and enters the Hindi film industry.

name: Table No. 21
outline: A couple live a mediocre life and are thrilled to have won an exotic vacation to Fiji & their excitement...

name: Yamla Pagla Deewana
outline: A married Canadian travels to India to re-unite with his estranged father and brother but faces obstacles and challenges.

name: Dil To Pagal Hai
outline: The story of four lovers: Rahul, Ajay, Pooja, and Nisha. This Yash Chopra fantasy explores romance as the days go on, and who live in a really nice dream house while their dreams come true.

name: Agneepath
outline: A young boy's father is lynched before his eyes; fifteen years later he returns home for revenge.

name: Delhi-6
outline: A story about love, hope and self-discovery set in the walled city of Delhi (zip code 6) and its chaotic but touching life that forces us to ask questions about ourselves.

name: Deewaar
outline: As a youth, Vijay struggles as a dockworker. Eventually, he becomes a leading figure of the underworld, while younger brother, Ravi, is an educated, upright policeman. But in the end, it all comes down to, who does mother love more?

name: Commando
outline: Karan Dogra, an Indian commando, lands in China due to a plane crash. But Indian government term him as a terrorist.

name: Singham
outline: A humiliated gangster uses his influence and goon power to terrorize a newly transferred police officer.

name: 1920: Evil Returns
outline: This story revolves around a famous poet who meets a woman who is in trouble. In order to treat her...

name: Chandni Chowk to China
outline: An action-comedy about a simple cook from Chandni Chowk mistaken for the reincarnation of an ancient peasant warrior Liu Shengh by residents of an oppressed Chinese village.

name: Partner
outline: A 'Love Guru' assists other males, woos a widowed single mother, but becomes embroiled in controversies.

name: Joker
outline: In 1947 when the maps of India and Pakistan were being drawn, an oversight ensured that the village of Paglapur didn't find a place in either country...

name: We Are Family
outline: Diagnosed with cancer, a mother decides to find a step-mom for her 3 children.

name: Dev D
outline: After breaking up with his childhood sweetheart, a young man finds solace in drugs. Meanwhile, a teenage girl is caught in the world of prostitution. Will they be destroyed, or will they find redemption?

name: Jab We Met
outline: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

name: Bodyguard
outline: The daughter of a wealthy nobleman secretly falls in love with her bodyguard.

name: Ek Thi Daayan
outline: A popular illusionist is haunted by a Daayan witch.

name: Action Replayy
outline: A young man tries to revive his parents' wilting marriage in a unique manner - travel to the 1970s when their romance was budding and make it bloom. This is more complex than he expects.

name: Straight from the Heart
outline: A student of classical music and his teacher's daughter fall in love. However, the young woman's family arrange for her marriage to another man. The new groom surprises everyone with his actions in handling the situation.

name: Fanaa
outline: Set in Delhi and the Kashmir Valley, a blind woman falls in love with a rakish tour guide who hides a terrible secret...

name: Once Upon a Time in Mumbai
outline: A smuggler rises to power in in 1970s Mumbai, a younger gangster seeks to overthrow him, and a police officer is caught in the middle.

name: Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar
outline: A rich brat and a poor chap try to woo a girl, with their rivalry culminating in the most prestigious college event - the marathon cycle race.

name: Salaam-E-Ishq
outline: Six couples in love must face different problems caused by love itself. Do they resolve their issues and face life anew, or do they succumb under pressure ?

name: Son of Sardaar
outline: Returning to his parents' village, a man becomes the latest target in a long-standing family feud.

name: Hate Story
outline: Kaavya became a prostitute to take revenge on rich guy Siddharth.

name: Anjaana Anjaani
outline: After numerous attempts at suicide fail, a couple decide to live it up, and then kill themselves on New Year's Day.

name: Raavan
outline: A bandit leader kidnaps the wife of the policeman who killed his sister, but later falls in love with her.

name: Wanted
outline: Radhe is a ruthless gangster who will kill anyone for money. He is attracted towards Jhanvi, a middle class girl, who does not approve of his work and wants him to change.

name: Dhoom
outline: A gang of bikers headed by the cool-headed and arrogant Kabir is on a robbing spree in Mumbai. They...

name: Khakee
outline: DCP Anant Shrivastav (Amitabh Bachchan) has been assigned the mission to escort terrorist Iqbal Ansari (Atul Kulkarni) from Chandangarh to Mumbai...
